name: audiodongle
0:
”Alexa, ask audio dongle head up”
”Alexa, ask audio dongle head down”
”Alexa, ask audio dongle leg up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audio dongle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is used for control the smart bed device of Topqizhi company,
you can control the smart bed device by the flow voice command :
1. "Alexa, ask audio dongle head up"
2. "Alexa, ask audio dongle head down"
3. "Alexa, ask audio dongle leg up"
4. "Alexa, ask audio dongle leg down"
5. "Alexa, ask audio dongle foot down"
6. "Alexa, ask audio dongle foot up"
7. "Alexa, ask audio dongle anti-snore"
8. "Alexa, ask audio dongle flat"
9. "Alexa, ask audio dongle stop"
10. "Alexa, ask audio dongle light on"
11. "Alexa, ask audio dongle light off"
12. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lights on"
13. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lights off"
14. "Alexa, ask audio dongle toggle light"
15. "Alexa, ask audio dongle toggle lights"
16. "Alexa, ask audio dongle feedback on"
17. "Alexa, ask audio dongle feedback off"
18. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lumbar up"
19. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lumbar down"
20. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lounge"
21. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lounge program"
22. "Alexa, ask audio dongle incline"
23. "Alexa, ask audio dongle incline program"
24. "Alexa, ask audio dongle zero gravity"
25. "Alexa, ask audio dongle zero gravity program"
26. "Alexa, ask audio dongle wave one"
27. "Alexa, ask audio dongle wave two"
28. "Alexa, ask audio dongle wave three"
29. "Alexa, ask audio dongle wave four"
30. "Alexa, ask audio dongle full body one"
31. "Alexa, ask audio dongle full body two"
32. "Alexa, ask audio dongle massage on"
32. "Alexa, ask audio dongle massage up"
33. "Alexa, ask audio dongle massage down"
34. "Alexa, ask audio dongle massage stop"
35. "Alexa, ask audio dongle lounge"
